Text: The bitrate is perfect and so is this great rock- album! Thanks a lot, buddy :-) Good job.

There is something wrong, buddy. This is a 3 cd- complication, but when you play it on Windows Media Player, all songs shows like it is only one cd, instead of the 3 cd's.. Hope you follow me and please make it work correctly in the future, thanks :-)

@Mikkel32

Don't use a third-rate media player?  There are plenty of free options far, far better than that POS.

@Mikkel,
WMP never sorts tracks according to discs mate, 
All the tracks have their disc names tagged and are grouped into different folders.
like SciBooks is saying use a different Player like Foobar, Winamp etc. :)
